Your goal is to generate a new test file (%project_root%/test/test.md), with the following contents:

```markdown
# Test File

This is a test file for the platform engineering mode.

## Test Cases

- [ ] Test case 1
- [ ] Test case 2
- [ ] Test case 3
```
